section.title: Breeder Distribution Variance
section.para: Breeder Items are Items from which other Items (i.e., Co-Products and By-Products) are produced. To view breeder distribution variances generated during the manufacturing process, select the "Breeder Distribution Variance" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing breeder distribution variances, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display breeder distribution variances for all Sites.
Specify Site whose breeder distribution variances you want to display.
Breeder distribution variances generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Breeder distribution variances generated on or before this date will be displayed. Runs the report associated with this screen.
Select to narrow your search criteria to a single Item.
Enter the Item Number of the Item whose breeder distribution variances you want to view.
Display lists breeder distribution variances, using the specified parameters.
